scripts.install:all: cd apps/backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.build:all: npm run install:all && npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.start: npx concurrently "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:frontend"
scripts.dev: npx concurrently "cd apps/backend && npm run start:dev" "cd apps/frontend && npm run dev"
